name: Cabify, Inc.
description: Provider of on-demand transportation services intended to promote mobility in cities. The company's services offer clean, modern cars with added features including a choice of music, magazines, and water, among others, driven by hand-picked and specially trained drivers, enabling commuters with affordable, safe, and reliable rides wherever required.
one_liner: Provider of on-demand transportation services intended to promote mobility in cities. The company's services offer clean, modern cars with added features including a choice of music, magazines, and water, among others, driven by hand-picked and specially trained drivers, enabling commuters with affordable, safe, and reliable rides wherever required.
